live_updates: Technicians are on site working to restore service as quickly as possible. No ETA at this time but we will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available. Thank you for your patience!

52543.summary: Some customers in areas between Grand Prairie to Dawson Creek are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
52543.title: Aug 13 - Fort St John to Dawson Creek | Loss of Services (Fix in Progress)
